result.execSummary:
The defendant Mark Anthony Codiroli was found guilty of the following charge(s) in this case.

  • Operating While Revoked (Rev due to alc/contr subst/refusal) - 2nd Offense, an unclassified misdemeanor, Wisconsin Statutes 343.44(1)(b).

Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.

supervisions.notes: Costs to be paid directly to the Waushara County Clerk of Court within 60 days or establish a payment plan.  Failure to pay may result in suspension of your driver's license, tax intercept, a civil judgment being entered against you, a warrant being issued for your arrest for contempt and/or the debt being turned over to a collection agency.
DNA sample to be provided and surcharge assessed.

records.addlTxt: from Defendant Re: Clarification of IID Requirement Effective Date

1:45 pm case called. Defendant Mark Anthony Codiroli in court.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin. Resolution reached and stated on the record by ADA Anderson.   Defendant advised of right to counsel and expertise.  Voluntary waiver of counsel accepted by Court.  Defendant advised of minimum/maximum penalty.  Plea colloquy entertained.  Collateral consequences explained. Chapter 950 compliance addressed. Plea: No Contest to Count 1.  Court accepts plea and enters JOC. Court dismisses and reads-in Count 2. Court sentences the defendant to costs to be paid within 60 days or payment plan. DNA Sample to be provided. Appeal Rights Given.

ADDRESS INFO for Mark Anthony Codiroli
Current: PO Box 107, 148 Northwestern Ave, #1, Wautoma, WI 54982-0107 United States  (Effective: 07-08-2015)
Prior: 148 Northwestern Ave #1, 107, Wautoma, WI 54982
No operation of any motor vehicles under any circumstances.

Case Called @ 1:19 PM: Defendant Mark Anthony Codiroli in court with attorney Ben Szilagyi, both appearing via video.  Steven Paul Anderson appeared for the State of Wisconsin.    Complaint Stated - Advised of offense and minimum/maximum penalty.  Receipt Admitted - Reading Waived.   Bond will determine eligibility.  ADA argues for $1000 Signature Bond w/conditions.   SPD has no objection to bond request made by the State.  SPD states that it is believed that Def will now apply to the Court for Counsel.  Def understands that he will no longer be represented by SPD.  Def states that he would like an opportunity to discuss the matter with DA without counsel.   The Court:  $1000 Signature Bond ordered w/conditions.  NGP entered by Court.   STC Scheduled - NOH Given.  Court enters Riverside Ruling in favor of the State and probable cause finding as to each count alleged within the complaint.  Pre-trial conference scheduled for July 24, 2015 at 02.15 pm.  Status conference scheduled for August 18, 2015 at 10:15 am.
